author: Kevin M
title: Great Location, Great Staff
text:
This hotel is in a quiet street just off the Boulevard Beaumarchais about halfway between the Place de La Bastille and the Place de La Republique. It is no more than 10 minutes' walk from the Place des Vosges and the heart of the Marais district, so its location is a major selling point.
Another major selling point are its staff who are extremely pleasant and helpful. I was due to stay in a double room for one night before moving to a junior suite for two nights, but on arrival I was upgraded to the suite for the first night as well. Comfortable bed. Decent buffet breakfast with hot and cold options.
Criticisms or areas where there could be room for improvement:-
1. There is no actual outside space as the original courtyard has been covered over and is used as a dining area
2. The air conditioning needs overhauled - it isn't very efficient
3. The wifi is slow and erratic.
None of the above would put me off staying here again. I definitely would stay again and would recommend it to others.
